text: osarcoma     Treatment of liposarcoma may include the following:               -  Surgery to completely remove the tumor. If the cancer is not completely removed, a second surgery may be done.      -  Chemotherapy to shrink the tumor, followed by surgery.      -  Radiation therapy before or after surgery.      - A clinical trial of targeted therapy, radiation therapy, and surgery with or without chemotherapy.
